name: Straight2Market
overview:
straight2market is a specialist developer and distributor of turnkey mobile marketing solutions. Their applications include productivity, customer care and value-added services for the Apple iPhone and Apple iPod touch.

straight2market offers a unique combination of creative genius with the delivery focus of experienced enterprise software developers. Their customers benefit directly from more than twenty years of experience in sales, marketing, customer service and entertainment.

As a one-stop shop for Apple iPhone and Apple iPod touch applications, straight2market offers a complete portfolio including brand awareness-raising applications as well as mobile iCommerce solutions and personal productivity tools.

They also offer implementation and back-end integration services, as well as the development of web based interfaces and UIs for multimedia content administration and day-to-day operations. As approved distributor for iTunes App Store, they digitally code-sign your finished application and securely publish it worldwide or in your chosen regions.

straight2marketâ€™s in-house applications have frequently featured in the Top 10 iTunes App Store Best Sellers. They can also help you to create and implement viral marketing campaigns to accompany the launch of your application.
